response.headline: iPhone diagnostic scan setup instructions with button combination troubleshooting
response.summary: Press and hold both Volume buttons and Power button for 0.5 to 1 seconds until vibration occurs to initiate diagnostic scan. If scan doesn't trigger, continue holding buttons until vibration is felt.

extracted_text: Press and hold both Volume buttons and Power button for 0.5 to 1 seconds. The scan will begin if you feel a vibration.
Scan not triggered. Press the buttons for 0.5 to 1 seconds until the vibration.
image_details.key_interest: Button combination sequence for iPhone diagnostic mode
visual_hierarchy: iPhone device illustration with button indicators
